data.title: MEETING IN INFINITY by Kessel, John.: (1992) 1st edition., Signed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: ISBN: 9780870541643 - Signed by Author(s) - 1st edition. - Hardcover - Arkham House., Sauk City, WI: - 1992 - HC in dust jacket. 1st Printing. Illustrated by J. K. Potter. Signed by Kessel. Light crinkle at the head of the spine. A fine copy in a fine dust jacket. - MEETING IN INFINITY
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

VISA / MasterCard / American Express, Personal Checks, Money Orders and PayPal accepted. Books can be held for 10 days pending payment. Books will be shipped via media rate unless otherwise requested. Rates are $3.99 for the first book plus $1.50 for each additional book. Priority rates are $10.50 for the first book plus $3.50 for each additional book. Overseas rates are slightly higher and will be quoted on an individual basis. Florida residents must also include 7% sales tax. All books can be ...

More Information

Shipping Terms:

Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.
